# Research Topics

## Research Topics

Input Output Global supports academic research on interdisciplinary blockchain projects with an industry-wide impact.

Research topics of interest around current IOG products and systems are:

![](/dapp-development.svg)

### A DApp development ecosystem

The Cardano platform facilitates decentralized application development. Projects in various areas and topics that develop a DApp on the Cardano platform are welcome. A good entry point for DApp developers is the [Plutus Pioneer Program](https://github.com/input-output-hk/plutus-pioneer-program).

![](/cardano-logo.svg)

### A PoS blockchain protocol stack

A wide array of topics are relevant, such as PoS consensus layer and its scalability, robust networking, sidechain design and cross-chain interoperability, rewards distribution, governance.

![](/identus-logo.svg)

### A self-sovereign identity platform

Topics related to identity management including privacy enhancements or use-cases that exploit decentralized identity.

![](/hydra-logo.svg)

### A suite of layer-2 protocols

Potential topics of interest include exploring tradeoffs between criteria such as optimistic and worst-case settlement latency, full smart-contract compatibility, fluctuating-availability tolerance, main-chain footprint.

![](/plutus-logo.svg)

### A functional smart-contract language

Topics of interest include improving the development toolset for Plutus and smart-contract writing in general. Developer resources: [Plutus Core Github repository](https://github.com/input-output-hk/plutus).

![](/marlowe-pioneers-logo.svg)

### A finance-focused domain specific language

Development of other DSLs for specific domains with interest in design decentralized applications.

![](/daedalus-logo.svg)

### A full-node wallet

Topics of interest include key management and wallet security, wallet-to-wallet communication.

![](/lace-logo.svg)

### A light wallet

Topics of interest include wallet security, integration between wallet back ends and applications, key management.

![](/catalyst-logo.svg)

### A stakeholder-managed treasury for project funding

Some examples of topics include participatory budgeting, incentives for management of blockchain treasuries.

![IOHK logo black and white](https://ucarecdn.com/306dc384-d0ae-479a-9b7e-2814fbeaea9b/-/resize/200/)
